articles.content: The blubbing, I can just about handle. The new John Lewis Christmas ad is an unashamed tearjerker: a dad painstakingly teaches himself to skateboard, not because hes having a midlife crisis but becau… [+517 chars]

articles.author: Zoe Forsey, Jennifer Newton
articles.title: Eight biggest lies in The Crown season five - key parts of Netflix show that aren't real - The Mirror
articles.description: The Crown is back on our screens with season five - but many viewers have been left wondering if it's all true. We take a look at some of the storylines that didn't actually happen in real life
articles.content: After a two-year wait, season five of The Crown has finally dropped - and it certainly doesnt disappoint when it comes to royal drama. The latest offering of Netflixs award-winning show is by far the… [+8741 chars]
